text: @Acosta To the people of Florida: How much do you like the job being done by @realDonaldTrump acolyte @GovRonDeSantis? Is your life better now than before he took office? How does it feel to have your state set the daily record for Covid-19 deaths? Second thoughts?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
